title: My Daily Routine
prompt: Speak about the things you do every day from morning to night. Mention your habits, work, meals, and relaxation time.
standardAnswer: Wake up early and complete morning hygiene and exercise.
Have a healthy breakfast and prepare for the day.
Attend work or school and focus on daily tasks.
Take a break at lunchtime and resume afternoon responsibilities.
Spend the evening relaxing, having dinner, and winding down.

title: My Favorite Food
prompt: Describe a food you like the most. Mention its taste, ingredients, and why you like it.
standardAnswer: Identify the food and list its main ingredients.
Describe the unique taste and aroma of the dish.
Explain its texture and appearance.
Mention when the food is typically enjoyed.
State why it is a favorite, such as comfort or excitement in its flavor.

title: A Special Day in My Life
prompt: Describe one of a special day in your life. Include activities and experiences on that day.
standardAnswer: Mention the date or occasion that makes the day special.
Describe memorable events that happened in the morning.
Outline key activities or adventures during the afternoon.
Highlight important moments from the evening.
Summarize the overall feelings and impact of that day.

title: My Best Friend
prompt: Speak about your best friend, their name, appearance, qualities, and why you like them.
standardAnswer: Introduce your best friend by name.
Describe their physical appearance and style.
List qualities that make them a good friend.
Give examples of shared experiences or memorable moments.
Explain why their friendship is valuable and meaningful.

title: My Hobby
prompt: Describe your favorite activity that you enjoy doing in your free time.
standardAnswer: Name your hobby and briefly explain what it is.
Describe how and when you engage in this activity.
Explain what makes the hobby interesting or fun.
Mention any skills or creativity that it develops.
Express overall enjoyment and why it’s important to you.

title: My Favorite Festival
prompt: Speak about a festival you celebrate and why it is special for you.
standardAnswer: Name the festival and briefly explain its significance.
Describe the traditional activities and celebrations.
Mention special foods, decorations, or rituals involved.
Explain how family and community participate.
Highlight why the festival holds personal or cultural importance.

title: A Memorable Childhood Memory
prompt: Speak about a special moment from your childhood that you still remember.
standardAnswer: Set the scene by naming the event and location.
Identify who was involved in the memory.
Describe what happened during the event.
Express the emotions felt during that moment.
Explain how this memory has influenced you or stayed with you over time.

title: My Favorite Season
prompt: Describe the season you like the most and why.
standardAnswer: Identify your favorite season by name.
Describe the typical weather and natural beauty of the season.
List seasonal activities that you enjoy.
Highlight visual and sensory details like colors or sounds.
Explain the personal connection or feelings the season evokes.

title: My Dream Job
prompt: Speak about the job you want in the future and why it interests you.
standardAnswer: State the job title or field you are aiming for.
Describe the main responsibilities or tasks of that job.
Explain how your skills and interests align with the job.
Mention the potential impact of the job on your career and life.
Summarize why this job represents your dream career.

title: A Place I Want to Visit
prompt: Speak about a place you want to travel to and why.
standardAnswer: Identify the destination and its location.
Describe prominent landmarks and attractions at the place.
Explain the cultural or historical significance of the destination.
Mention activities or experiences you look forward to having.
State why visiting this place is a personal dream or goal.

title: My Family
prompt: Speak about your family members and their roles.
standardAnswer: Introduce the members of your family.
Describe each member's role or relationship in the family.
Share examples of family traditions or shared activities.
Mention how support and love are demonstrated within the family.
Explain the importance of family in your life.

title: A Special Day with My Parents
prompt: Describe a memorable day you spent with your parents.
standardAnswer: Describe the planned or spontaneous activity of the day.
Mention specific moments that made the day memorable.
Detail shared conversations or emotional interactions.
Outline any unique events or surprises during the day.
Reflect on how the day strengthened the bond with your parents.

title: The Person I Admire the Most
prompt: Speak about someone who inspires you.
standardAnswer: Identify the person and explain their background.
Highlight key qualities that make this person admirable.
Describe a specific action or achievement that inspires you.
Explain how they have influenced your life or decisions.
Summarize the overall impact of their example on you.

title: My Role Model
prompt: Describe someone you look up to and want to be like.
standardAnswer: Introduce your role model by name and profession.
List the admirable qualities and values they possess.
Describe challenges they have overcome in their life.
Explain how their actions guide or inspire your own behavior.
Summarize the lessons learned from observing their example.

title: A Fun Day with My Siblings
prompt: Speak about an enjoyable day spent with your brother or sister.
standardAnswer: Describe the setting and activities of the day.
Share fun moments or games played with your siblings.
Highlight any shared jokes or memorable interactions.
Detail outdoor or indoor activities that made it special.
Explain how the experience strengthened your sibling bond.

title: How I Help My Family at Home
prompt: Describe how you assist your family with daily chores.
standardAnswer: List the daily chores or tasks you perform at home.
Explain your role in keeping the household organized.
Highlight teamwork and shared responsibilities with family.
Describe how your contributions benefit the entire family.
Express personal satisfaction from helping out at home.

title: My Grandparents’ Stories
prompt: Speak about a story your grandparents told you.
standardAnswer: Introduce your grandparent and mention the story’s context.
Summarize the main events or message of the story.
Highlight any moral or lesson conveyed through the tale.
Describe how the story made you feel or think differently.
Explain the lasting impact or influence of the story on you.

title: My Favorite Family Tradition
prompt: Describe a tradition in your family and why you love it.
standardAnswer: Identify the family tradition and its origin.
Describe the activities or events that take place.
Explain how the tradition brings family members together.
Highlight any special food, decorations, or rituals involved.
Express the emotional significance and joy the tradition brings.

title: My School Days
prompt: Speak about your school memories, teachers, and friends.
standardAnswer: Describe the general atmosphere and environment at school.
Mention memorable subjects, teachers, or classes.
List fun or challenging experiences with friends.
Highlight specific events or activities that stood out.
Explain how these experiences helped shape your personal growth.

title: The Best Teacher I Ever Had
prompt: Speak about a teacher who inspired you the most.
standardAnswer: Introduce the teacher by name and subject taught.
Describe their teaching style and mannerisms.
Highlight specific qualities or actions that inspired you.
Explain the impact they had on your academic performance.
Summarize how their mentorship influenced your future goals.
